ISSUE.TITLE: App settings page. Fix a hyperlink to our documentation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go admin area > configuration > settings > app settings (/Admin/Setting/AppSettings) 2. Check the description at the top of the page 3. It points to a broken URL (https://docs.nopcommerce.com/en/developer/tutorials/description-of-settings-from-appsettings-json-file-and-NopConfig-class.html) instead of https://docs.nopcommerce.com/en/developer/tutorials/appsettings-json-file.html P.S. Ensure that all links are valid at \Nop.Services\Common\NopLinksDefaults.cs

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6806 Fixed problem with blog post URL on multilingual sitemaps

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6810 App settings page. Fixed a hyperlink to our documentation
